name: Shipwright 2.0 - UI Kit & Design System
description:
Shipwright 2.0

A fully-editable UI kit and design system. Shipwright 2.0 is an easier way to jumpstart your UI designs for new digital products or websites.

Shipwright 2.0 was created to help product teams at Headway start projects faster, be more consistent, and improve communication. This UI Kit can serve as the foundational building blocks to help you and your team bring new ideas to life quickly.


What’s Inside:

  • Over 700 + components
  • Full icon library
  • Marketing site blocks
  • Interactive Components & Autolayout
  • Replace Me concept


Education Inside the File

Haven’t used a UI Kit before? No problem.

This UI kit has guided text included with each component block explaining how it was built and how it can be used.


Tutorial Videos:

The tutorial videos teach you how the UI kit and design system works to get started on your project. You’ll learn the base principles the Headway Design Team chose when building Shipwright 2.0. That includes a design system management system to help communicate ideas across your teams.


Continuous Updates & Improvements

New releases coming soon!

This is a living document used by the Design Team at Headway. They are constantly finding ways to make it better and speed up their workflow.

Connect with Headway at https://www.headway.io


Change Log


  • 04/15: Added links to loom video cards.
  • 04/23: Added knowledge center video links.
  • 05/05: Added pagination and steppers, fixed a few bugs and adjusted the way menus worked. Moved navigation to live in the correct spot.
  • 06/15: Reorganized the navigation system adding in pagination, steppers, tabs, breadcrumb trails.
  • 06/17: New notification / alert components. Added sliders and tooltips and additional components.
